sentences.english: First part, Reeducation through Labor Review and Development.
sentences.chinese: 劳动教养制度的回顾和发展。

sentences.english: To abolish the reeducation-through-labor system becomes an inevitable tendency.
sentences.chinese: 废除劳动教养制度，成为一种必然的趋势。

sentences.english: First chapter elaborated education-through-labor historical vicissitude and the development tendency.
sentences.chinese: 第一章论述了劳动教养的历史变迁与发展趋势。

sentences.english: Not re-teaching staff of socialization is the core of the work of reeducation through labor.
sentences.chinese: 对未教人员的再社会化是劳动教养工作的核心内容。

sentences.english: In the third part , the author makes relative study on the resemble systems of the West.
sentences.chinese: 第三章劳动教养国外相关制度的比较研究。

definition: custody and reeducation (administrative punishment for prostitutes)
to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
